casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Silverman, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Silverman, 118 Ohio St.3d 53, 2008-Ohio-1845.]

(No. 2007-1734 Submitted March 26, 2008 Decided April 23, 2008.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Scott M. Heenan, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Rubenstein & Thurman, L.P.A., Inc., and Scott A. Rubenstein, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Fulmer, 117 Ohio St.3d 319, 2008-Ohio-936, 883 N.E.2d 1052.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
